name: Fanatic

skills.name: Devil Hunt
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 30% chance of placing a 30% [Decrease DEF] debuff for 2 turns. Has a 30% of placing a 60% [Decrease DEF] debuff instead if the target is under 2 or more debuffs.
Level 2: Damage +5%
Level 3: Damage +5%
Level 4: Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Level 5: Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Damage Multiplier: 4 ATK
Damage based on: [ATK]

skills.name: Cursebearer
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 75% chance of transferring 2 random debuffs from this champion to the target.
Level 2: Damage +5%
Level 3: Damage +5%
Level 4: Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Level 5: Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Level 6: Buff/Debuff Chance +15%
Level 7: Cooldown -1
Damage Multiplier: 5.5 ATK
Damage based on: [ATK]

skills.name: Rally Cry
skills.raw_description:
Places a 50% [Increase ATK] buff on all allies for 2 turns and removes one random debuff from each ally
Level 2: Cooldown -1

faction.name: Shadowkin
faction.default_description: Shadowkin is a faction from RAID Shadow Legends composed of 12 champions

seo.title: %%title%% %%page%% %%sep%% %%parent_title%% %%sep%% %%sitename%%
seo.description: Shadowkin is a faction from RAID Shadow Legends. Find out more on this Raid Shadow Legends codex.

structured_data.description: The Shadowkin hail from the far reaches of the Eastern Continent, beyond the Brimstone Path. Under the brutal heel of the Demonspawn for the past fives centuries, only recently have they cast off Siroth's yoke and rejoined the larger world. Years bent to evil purpose have left a darkness about them, and their fight to regain their lost honor has only just begun.
